alert.note: Alert for Langlade; Menominee (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 5:39PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Menominee and southwestern Langlade Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 539 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Antigo, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, nickel size hail and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will will through the following counties, including the following locations... Bryant, Deerbrook, Lake Noseum, Polar, Phlox, Neva, Upper Bass Lake and Zoar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
